segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I notice the woman totally absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes, apron on, looking so domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is running full blast, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear it or see the overflow?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, soaking her shoes, and she just stands there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, that boy climbing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping him, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible, all of them oblivious to the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage, potential falls, what a mess they're making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks peaceful, mocking the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't believe no one's paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
